extensionDescription.message: Make any X.com list your default view - helping you consume content more intentionally

step2.message: You will be redirected to X (Twitter) homepage

step3.message: Click on the tab you want to set as default from the top tabs (For you, Following, Custom Lists)

step4.message: Setup will complete automatically with a notification

note.message: Note: "For you" and "Following" cannot be selected. Only custom lists can be set.

settingModeEnabled.message: Setup mode enabled. Click on a list in X (Twitter).

settingModeIndicator.message: Setup Mode: Click on a tab at the top of the home screen

extensionInfo.message: Default list will be automatically displayed when you open X (Twitter).

disclaimer.message: LessAddicted is an unofficial third-party tool for X.com. Its sole purpose is to automate the action of making a list tab your default view. It operates by interacting with the existing user interface and does not involve data collection, content modification, or other activities that would typically fall under Terms of Service restrictions. To verify if it doesn't have any backdoor, check
